component.description: Treetable is is used for displaying hierarchical data in tabular format.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false org.primefaces.model.TreeNode true
var false java.lang.String true true
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the container element.
selection false java.lang.Object true TreeNode array to reference the selections.
selectionMode false java.lang.String true Defines the selectionMode, valid values are "single" and "multiple".
scrollable false java.lang.Boolean false Makes data scrollable with fixed header. Default is false.
scrollHeight false java.lang.String Height for scrollable data.
scrollWidth false java.lang.String Width for scrollable data.
tableStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of the table element.
tableStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the table element.
emptyMessage false java.lang.String No records found. Text to display when there is no data to display. Default is "No records found."
resizableColumns false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if columns can be resized or not.
rowStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for each row.
liveResize false java.lang.Boolean false Columns are resized live in this mode without using a resize helper.
required false java.lang.Boolean false Validation constraint for selection. true
requiredMessage false java.lang.String Message for required selection validation. true
sortBy false java.lang.Object Expression for default sorting.
sortOrder false java.lang.String ascending Defines default sorting order. Default is "ascending"
sortFunction false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.Integer sort(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object) Custom pluggable sortFunction for default sorting.
nativeElements false java.lang.Boolean false In native mode, treetable uses native checkboxes.
dataLocale false java.lang.Object Locale to be used in features such as sorting, defaults to view locale.
caseSensitiveSort false java.lang.Boolean false Case sensitivity for sorting, insensitive by default.
skipChildren false java.lang.Boolean false Ignores processing of children during lifecycle, improves performance if table only has output components, default is false. true
showUnselectableCheckbox false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if in checkbox selection mode, a readonly checkbox should be displayed for an unselectable node. Default is false. true
nodeVar false java.lang.String Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used to refer current treenode using EL. true
expandMode false java.lang.String children Updates children only when set to "children" or the node itself with children when set to "self" on node expand.
stickyHeader false java.lang.Boolean false Sticky header stays in window viewport during scrolling.
editable false java.lang.Boolean false Controls incell editing.
editMode false java.lang.String row Defines edit mode, valid values are "row" (default) and "cell".
editingRow false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if cell editors of row should be displayed as editable or not. Default is false meaning display mode.
cellSeparator false java.lang.String Separator text to use in output mode of editable cells with multiple components.
disabledTextSelection false java.lang.Boolean true Disables text selection on row click. Default is true.
paginator false java.lang.Boolean false Enables pagination. Default is false.
paginatorTemplate false java.lang.String {FirstPageLink} {PreviousPageLink} {PageLinks} {NextPageLink} {LastPageLink} {RowsPerPageDropdown} Template of the paginator.
rowsPerPageTemplate false java.lang.String Template of the rowsPerPage dropdown.
rowsPerPageLabel false java.lang.String Label for rowsPerPage dropdown.
currentPageReportTemplate false java.lang.String Template of the currentPageReport UI.
pageLinks false java.lang.Integer 10 Maximum number of page links to display. Default is 10.
paginatorPosition false java.lang.String both Position of the paginator. Default is both.
paginatorAlwaysVisible false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if paginator should be hidden if total data count is less than number of rows per page. Default is true.
rows java.lang.Integer 0 Number of rows to display per page. Default value is 0 meaning to display all data available.
first false java.lang.Integer 0 Index of the first data to display.
